exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : poly A0 eqA ltM aP, Q, R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : OBuch (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP Q) R H : ~ BuchAux.zerop A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) H2 : forall a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM, In a0 (a :: Q) -> Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 aP IHOBuch : (forall a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM, In a0 (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP Q) -> Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP)) -> stable (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) R Unable to unify "stable (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) R" with "stable aP R".

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : poly A0 eqA ltM aP, Q, R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : OBuch (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP Q) R H : BuchAux.zerop A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) -> False H2 : forall a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM, a = a0 \\/ In a0 Q -> Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 aP IHOBuch : (forall a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM, In a0 (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP Q) -> Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP)) -> stable (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) R The term "eqA_dec" has type "forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False}" while it is expected to have type "forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}" (cannot unify "{eqA a0 b} + {eqA a0 b -> False}" and "{a0 = b} + {a0 <> b}").

exceptions.exn: In environment X : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x = y -> False}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {In a l} + {In a l -> False} A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : poly A0 eqA ltM aP, Q, R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : OBuch (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP Q) R H : BuchAux.zerop A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) -> False H2 : forall a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM, a = a0 \\/ In a0 Q -> Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 aP IHOBuch : (forall a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM, In a0 (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP Q) -> Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP)) -> stable (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) R Unable to unify "(let (x, _) := ?M9661 in fun Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x) aP" with "stable aP R".

exceptions.exn: In environment X0, X : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x = y -> False}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {In a l} + {In a l -> False} A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : poly A0 eqA ltM aP, Q, R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : OBuch (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP Q) R H : BuchAux.zerop A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) -> False H2 : forall a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM, a = a0 \\/ In a0 Q -> Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 aP IHOBuch : (forall a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM, In a0 (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP Q) -> Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP)) -> stable (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) R Unable to unify "(let (x, _) := ?M11496 in fun Q : list (poly ?M11482 ?M11484 ?M11493) => CombLinear ?M11481 ?M11482 ?M11484 ?M11485 ?M11488 ?M11491 ?M11492 ?M11493 ?M11494 Q x) (?M11497 :: ?M11498)" with "stable aP R".

exceptions.exn: In environment H0 : forall (A : Set) (A0 A1 : A) (eqA : A -> A -> Prop) (plusA : A -> A -> A) (invA : A -> A) (minusA multA : A -> A -> A) (divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A), CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA -> forall (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False}) (n : nat) (ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop) (ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}), OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) -> forall (a b : poly A0 eqA ltM) (Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM)), Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a Q -> Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a (b :: Q) X1, X0, X : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x = y -> False}) -> forall (a : A) (l : list A), {In a l} + {In a l -> False} A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, (eqA b A0 -> False) -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {eqA a b -> False} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) a : poly A0 eqA ltM aP, Q, R : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H1 : OBuch (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP Q) R H : BuchAux.zerop A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) -> False H2 : forall a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM, a = a0 \\/ In a0 Q -> Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 aP IHOBuch : (forall a0 : poly A0 eqA ltM, In a0 (genPcPf (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP Q) -> Cb A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec a0 (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP)) -> stable (addEnd A A0 eqA n ltM (nf A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA cs eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec os a aP) aP) R Unable to unify "(let (x, _) := ?M14313 in fun Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) => CombLinear A A0 eqA plusA multA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x) aP" with "stable aP R".

original: intros P Q R H1 H2. induction H1. - apply stable0; intros a H3. + apply H2. right. auto. + apply H2. left. reflexivity. - apply IHOBuch. intros a H3. destruct (In_dec eqA_dec aP a). + apply Cb_in with (b := a0). auto. auto. + apply H2. apply Cb_genPcPf with (b := a0) (P0 := genPcPf a0 aP Q). * apply Cb_in1. auto. * intros b H4. apply H2. auto.
